og.description: OTTAWA - Thirty miles of US-59 highway and 48 years of age separate Mike Pryor and Britani Potter but ideological differences cut much deeper between the Democratic congressional candidates.
og.title: Different shades of Democrat color candidates challenging Rep. Lynn Jenkins

article_metadata.description: OTTAWA — Thirty miles of US-59 highway and 48 years of age separate Mike Pryor and Britani Potter but ideological differences cut much deeper between the Democratic congressional candidates.Pryor, 76, is a self-described democratic socialist, “proud bleeding heart liberal” and admirer of presidential candidate Bernie Sanders. A Lawrence resident, he has organized Sanders supporters in Douglas County for three years and runs a website urging Sanders to select U.S. Sen. Elizabeth Warren as a running mate.
